name: ZIPZIP
description:
Attention, this game can be addictive. Make the ball bounce as long as you can.

If you like arcade soccer game, you will probably like this game too.

-Control the bigger ball and make the little ball bounce.
-Every bounce counts one point.
-Bounce it without dropping as long as you can.
-Connect to Game Center Game Service and save your best score.
-Don't touch a wall more than 3 seconds, if you do wall will be disappear.
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
